code: @Test public void defaultScheduler() {     ThreadPoolTaskScheduler scheduler = (ThreadPoolTaskScheduler) this.context.getBean("defaultScheduler").     Integer size = (Integer) new DirectFieldAccessor(scheduler).getPropertyValue("poolSize").     assertEquals(new Integer(1), size). }

@Test public void customScheduler() {     ThreadPoolTaskScheduler scheduler = (ThreadPoolTaskScheduler) this.context.getBean("customScheduler").     Integer size = (Integer) new DirectFieldAccessor(scheduler).getPropertyValue("poolSize").     assertEquals(new Integer(42), size). }

@Test public void threadNamePrefix() {     ThreadPoolTaskScheduler scheduler = (ThreadPoolTaskScheduler) this.context.getBean("customScheduler").     assertEquals("customScheduler-", scheduler.getThreadNamePrefix()). }
